slides.content:
# This _was_ a new slide 
## but now it's pretty well established

...first slide, who dis!

# This is the _new_ second slide
## The first one was deleted in a terrible accident

Here's an unordered list to make me feel better:
* What
* is
* this!

# This is a new ~~fourth~~ _third_ slide
 ...and add some content!

# This is a new slide, too
 ...and it was injected dynamically!

# This is a new slide 
 ...and add some content!

# This should be the First Slide
## ...of the second deck!

_Niiiiice_

# SECOND SLIDE Y'ALL

This should be the second slide
This should be the third slide
This should be the fourth slide
